üéÆ **A super fun zombie shooter** üßü - GingasVR

üëæ **The Flip is the perfect game!** üåü - turbotek_td

üëÄ **The biggest hordes yet to be seen on the Quest headset** üï∂Ô∏è - Mac in VR

ü§ù **A great multiplayer experience** üéâ - FluffySez


**The Flip** is the cooperative VR shooter you‚Äôve been waiting for! Flip City is overrun with the undead and it‚Äôs up to intrepid survivors to blast through the hordes. Filled with ravenous nano-tech-infused zombie hordes, jump into missions solo or better yet, team up with friends. Using The Flip‚Äôs built-in voice chat you can easily coordinate with the group or just scream üò± at them!

**Features:**

- ü§ù | **4 Player Co-op Fun** - Team up with 3 mates on epic 15-minute runs or make new friends in the 12-player lobbies!

- üöÄ | **Mission Overload!**- A mission DJ flips up levels and modifiers on constant rotation, giving you over 2,000 different missions to engage in.

- üî´ | **A powerful arsenal** - Dual-wield Shotguns, SMGs, Grenade launchers and more!

- üéöÔ∏è | **Dynamic Difficulty** - The more you play the larger the hordes get. Pick a mission and hope for the best!

- üßü | **Mission Masochist** - Choose from ‚ÄúStandard‚Äù or ‚ÄúSpecial‚Äù missions that let you dive into ‚ÄòUltra Hardcore‚Äô missions - or just build up XP in the explosive ‚ÄúDook Nook‚Äù missions.

- üé© | **Dress for Success** - Successfully Exfil to gain XP and level up, unlocking new avatars and outfits!

- üè† | **Home Sweet Home** - Chill with your mates, play some basketball or customise your character before heading back in for more zombie guts!

changelog.change_log:
v.1.74986233
- Improved notification of app updates so users are aware when new stuff is available
- Fix issues with helicopters not landing in the lobby

Update 1.74896227 - 19/04/2024
- Doubled turn speed for smooth turning
- Increased minimum difficulty level so new users see more zombies quicker!
